name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Python Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in developing scalable applications and implementing robust software development best practices. Proficient in **Python**, **Django**, **SQL**, and adept in **CI/CD** practices with a strong focus on **Git** for version control. Experienced in building and consuming **REST APIs** and **GraphQL** services to optimize application performance.
Skilled in deployment and orchestration on cloud platforms including **AWS** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring high availability and reliability of software solutions. Committed to maintaining coding standards through thorough **code reviews**, unit testing, and integration testing, fostering a culture of quality and risk mitigation within teams.
Demonstrated success in technical debt management and mentorship, guiding junior developers in software design patterns and best practices. Background in creating AI/ML-powered applications enhances capabilities in delivering innovative solutions.
